name: mindfultab
description: MindfulHome companion extension for Edge and Firefox.

scripts.build:zip: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path dist) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path dist | Out-Null; Compress-Archive -Path manifest.json,src -DestinationPath dist/mindfultab.zip -Force"
